text: The temperature in New York City this week was near freezing. Bella Hadid was spotted rocking a crop top in NYC on Wednesday despite the chill in the air. Cameras snapped the 22 - year - old'it girl'as she headed out to a photo shoot in the out of season look. Doing it for fashion : Bella Hadid braved frigid temps in a belly baring crop top on Wednesday as she stepped out in NYC The beauty donned a matching cropped charcoal denim jacket and cargo pants with her white crop top. Bella reportedly regretted her outfit choice and laughed as she told the paparazzi she was cold. The star paired her look with a chunky pair of white high top sneakers and some tiny grey sun glasses.
